Margin

margin can be auto

Display

Block, inline

Box-sizing

border-box or content-box

Another opportuniti for selecting in css

.classname tagname {}

will only effect to the tagname tags in the classname classes

Cursor:

lots ofopportunities like pointer or anithing

Flex

display: flex;

flex-direction: row, column, ...

flex-wrap: wrap, nowrap, ...

justify-content: flex-start center space-between space-around (horisontally positioning)

align-content: flex-start center space-between space-around (verticaly positioning)
